name: Navy Blue Single Shoulder Dress
description: Elegant asymmetrical party and formal outfit in navy blue, machine washable A-line dress suitable for formal events, everyday to evening chic. Perfect vacation wear with ruffled hem, stylish detailing, and fashionable design for women.

name: Floral Square Neck Dress with Ruffled Hem
description: Elegant floral dress featuring a square neckline, ruffled hem, and short sleeves in light blue. Flowy A-line cut ideal for spring and summer wear.

name: French-Inspired Chiffon Dress with Butterfly Print
description: Elegant women's chiffon dress inspired by French fashion with butterfly print, square neckline, ruched waist, and puff sleeves. Perfect for dates, weddings, parties, and casual outings.

name: Casual Leopard Print 'Cherry' Graphic T-Shirt
description: Women's casual graphic T-shirt with leopard and cherry print, relaxed fit round neck, breathable mid-stretch fabric. Machine washable, spring and summer appropriate fast fashion top, durable digital print.

name: Casual Solid Color Short Sleeve Top & Wide Leg Pants Set
description: 2025 new casual women's set including ribbed solid color short sleeve top and high-waisted wide leg pants in green. Designed for all-season comfort fit with breathable fabric.

description: Stylish heeled sandal from ALDO, open and breathable design. Perfect for formal or casual summer events, vacation wear.

description: Elegant platform heeled sandal with airy design by Jessica Simpson, providing style and comfort. Great for everyday to evening chic occasions.

name: WESTBRONCO Small Puffer Crescent Shoulder Bag
description: Lightweight nylon quilted small puffer shoulder bag with adjustable strap. Ideal for carrying essentials while keeping cool.

name: BESTKANG Leather Strap Watch
description: Elegant dainty women's vintage quartz wristwatch with leather strap and rectangle dial. Stylish and lightweight.

name: Lola Rose Dainty Watch
description: Dainty watch for women featuring mother of pearl dial and genuine leather strap. Comes in a stylish gift box. Vintage style suitable for lightweight daily wear.

name: Fossil Men's Wade Leather Bifold Wallet
description: Black leather bifold wallet by Fossil with flip ID holder. Durable and slim for easy carry due to compact design.

description: RFID blocking genuine leather trifold wallet featuring 11 card slots and ID window. Slim design ideal for everyday carry.

description: Men's loafer dress shoes stylish and suitable for warm weather due to breathable leather design. Ideal for casual or semi-formal wear.

name: Cole Haan Men's Wyatt Bit Driver Loafers
description: Comfortable driving style loafers made of genuine leather. Lightweight and breathable, suitable for casual outings.

name: Coach Brooklyn Shoulder Bag 28 - Maple Color
description: Stylish shoulder bag with practical size, made of quality materials, designed for ease of carry. Appropriate for casual and travel use.

description: Elegant women's midi-length bodycon dress made of lightweight polyester, featuring an off-shoulder neckline and puff sleeves with geometric lace detailing. Includes a side slit and zipper closure. Perfect for spring and summer casual to formal occasions, combining style with breathable comfort.

name: Casual Sports Top and Bottom Set
description: 2025 new men's casual sportswear set including a crew neck short sleeve top and matching bottoms made of breathable polyester fabric.

name: KOONEXY Casual Sneakers - White & Black Low-Top Lace-Up Shoes with Golden Accents

name: Mid Rise Slim Fit Tapered Leg Jean
description: Men's mid rise slim fit tapered leg jeans in indigo wash by GUESS. Designed for a modern, sleek silhouette combining comfort and style. Made from durable denim fabric, perfect for casual and semi-formal wear.

name: Kenneth Cole Men's Athletic Fit Jeans
description: Men's athletic fit jeans with roomier fit in waist, hip, and thighs. Made from flexible stretch denim for comfort and movement. Features a straight leg design, durable fabric, and classic styling suitable for casual wear.
